entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
